title: ‏Mohammad Al Gergawi‏ - ‏وزير شؤون مجلس الوزراء بدولة الإمارات العربية المتحدة • UAE Minister of Cabinet Affairs‏ | LinkedIn

quotes: His Excellency Mohammad bin Abdullah Al Gergawi was appointed Minister of Cabinet Affairs of the UAE Government in 2006
Between February 2016 and July 2020, he was tasked with developing the UAE’s Future Foresight Strategy to promote government readiness for future challenges.
Al Gergawi also initiated excellence programs to boost the efficiency of the public and private sectors, such as the Dubai Quality Award (1994)
Al Gergawi also initiated excellence programs to boost the efficiency of the public and private sectors, such as [...] Dubai Government Excellence Program (1997)
Al Gergawi also initiated excellence programs to boost the efficiency of the public and private sectors, such as [...] Mohammed bin Rashid Government Excellence Award (2009)
In 2018, he joined the UN Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on Digital Cooperation, aimed at addressing technological challenges.

overseeing the federal government strategy, aligning efforts with the UAE National Agenda, enhancing national competitiveness, and ensuring high government performance across all sectors.
Between February 2016 and July 2020, he was tasked with developing the UAE’s Future Foresight Strategy to promote government readiness for future challenges.
